title: Llangain: Woman, 74, dies after house fire
article: A 74-year-old woman has died following a fire at a house in Llangain, Carmarthen . Fire crews went to Dol-Y-Dderwen at about midday on Wednesday 29 December, along with police and ambulance.The woman was pronounced dead at the scene, and police are not treating her death as suspicious.Mid and West Wales Fire and Rescue Service has launched an investigation into the incident and the coroner has been informed.
